description: Download all completed PDFs as a ZIP archive

flags.description: Overwrite output file if it exists
flags.name: --overwrite

permissions: Allowed when show? is permitted for the PDF generation (delegated to the related organization invoices batch policy).
side_effects: Writes a ZIP file to the local filesystem.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. If no PDFs are completed, the API responds with 404. When --overwrite is not set, the command fails if the output file already exists.
